ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] 50+ bard songs
ygData.msgSnippet: oh it said Sartori Stormraven (it did i m not crazy).  is Stormraven your druid? my friend cast her wiz portal after we bought it together.  she got kicked
ygData.messageBody:
oh it said Sartori Stormraven (it did i'm not crazy). is Stormraven your
druid?

my friend cast her wiz portal after we bought it together. she got kicked
back to where she cast it from, it said the zone is currently down. and she
could not cast or click any buttons so she hd to quit out hehe.

Shada


> I'm hoping that at least 51 will be purchaseable right off
> the bat. I bought
> and scribed Circle of Combines for my druid last night. I was
> tempted to
> cast it. I'm sure it will probably just safe zone you, but
> knowing Verant it
> might throw you out of the world or something. I'm not
> following you on the
> last name question.
>
> Sartori D'Elsiraad<Legion>
> 50th Bard of Veeshan
